sense.def:
One's mind
je zmožnost mišljenja. Kadar je nekaj
in one's mind
, pomeni, da o tistem človek razmišlja.

seg.quote: ...the evolution of the human mind.
He could hear in his mind the wailings of the women.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
doesn't mind something
, ga nekaj ne jezi ali moti.

seg.quote: I don't mind personal questions at all.
I don't mind walking.
Do you mind if I stay here?

sense.def:
Mind
rečemo tudi, kadar hočemo nekoga opozoriti, naj bo previden, da se ne bo poškodoval ali povzročil škode.

seg.quote: Mind the ice on the step as you go.
Mind my specs!

sense.def:
Kadar človek
minds something
, nekaj časa nekaj ali nekoga nadzoruje, na primer otroka, trgovino ali prtljago.

seg.quote: My mother is minding the office.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
takes one's mind off a problem
, pomaga človeku, da za nekaj časa pozabi na težavo.

Kadar človeku nekaj
comes to mind
, se spomni tistega brez posebnega truda.

seg.quote: I just pick up whatever groceries come to mind.

sense.def:
Kadar nekomu rečemo
bear something in mind
ali
keep something in mind
, mu naročimo, naj si tisto zapomni, ker je pomembno.

seg.quote: Bear in mind that these are sixty-five-year-old men.
It is important to keep in mind that these words are clues.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
one's mind is on something
povemo, da človek misli na tisto stvar.

seg.quote: Her mind was not on the announcements she was making.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
on one's mind
, je nekdo zaradi tistega zaskrbljen in o tistem veliko razmišlja.

Kadar človek
has something in mind
, ima namen tisto dobiti ali narediti.

seg.quote: It will be up to her to tell you what she has in mind.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
has a good mind to do something
, bi tisto rad naredil, čeprav verjetno ne bo.

seg.quote: I've a good mind to punish you for behaving so badly.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
puts one's mind to something
, nečemu posveti veliko energije, dela in pozornosti.

seg.quote: You could get a job in London, if you put your mind to it.

sense.def:
Izraz
to my mind
uporabimo, kadar hočemo opozoriti, da izražamo svoje lastno mnenje.

seg.quote: The worst part of air travel to my mind is the hanging around in airport lounges.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
has an open mind
, si še ni ustvaril mnenja o neki zadevi in čaka, dokler ne bo poznal vseh dejstev.

Kadar človek
makes one's mind up
, sklene, katero izmed več možnosti bo uporabil.

seg.quote: We have to make up our minds quickly, or they'll go without us.
My mind's made up.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
changes one's mind
, spremeni svojo prejšnjo odločitev ali mnenje.

seg.quote: All of a sudden I changed my mind and decided not to go anywhere.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
in two minds about something
, se ne more odločiti, ali bi tisto naredil ali ne.

seg.quote: I was very much in two minds whether to apply for the Cambridge job.

sense.def:
Kadar človek vidi nekaj
in one's mind's eye
, si tisto predstavlja.

seg.quote: In her mind's eye, she had pictured herself in the new house.

sense.def:
One's state of mind
je stanje človekove duševnosti v določenem trenutku.

seg.quote: She was in a fairly disturbed state of mind.
I wouldn't mind a Renault myself.

sense.def:
Izraz
never mind
uporabimo, kadar hočemo pomiriti nekoga, ki je razburjen ali razočaran.

Prav tako uporabimo
never mind
, če hočemo reči, da nekaj ni pomembno, zlasti kadar se nam nekdo opraviči.

seg.quote: Some of their towels are soaking wet, but never mind.

sense.def:
Izraz
mind you
uporabimo, ko svojim prejšnjim besedam dodamo še nekaj, zlasti nasprotujočega.

seg.quote: Charles is fit and well. Not happy, mind you, just fit and well.
